name: easy-compose
description: EasyCompose a web platform to build your email templates with ease

scripts.install: npm i --save-dev concurrently && cd server && npm i && cd ../app && npm i
scripts.build: concurrently "cd server && npm run build" "cd app && npm run build"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run dev" "cd app && npm run dev"

author: curiouscoder00
